summary: Activity methods with boolean return types were failing with a type conversion error during serialization. The issue was caused by incorrect activity method configuration in the workflow code, not a SDK bug.
userImpact: Users experienced workflow failures when activities returned boolean values, with confusing error messages about type mismatches.
rootCause: User error - activity method prefix was not set correctly in the workflow configuration, causing the wrong activity method to be invoked.
resolutionDetails: Closed by the reporter after discovering they had misconfigured the activity method prefix, which caused the wrong method to be called.
keyQuote: Sorry guys, this is my fail, did not press the prefix in activities that had methods with the same name.
